org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.algorithm

Class AlgorithmInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.algorithm.AlgorithmInstance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Attributed

    @BuiltBy(value=AlgorithmInstanceBuilder.class)
public class AlgorithmInstance
extends java.lang.Object
implements Attributed
    An instance of a recommender algorithmInfo to be benchmarked.

      • getPreload

        public boolean getPreload()
        Query whether this algorithmInfo is to operate on in-memory data.
        Returns:
        true if the ratings database should be loaded in-memory prior to running.

      • buildRecommender

        public LenskitRecommender buildRecommender(@Nullable
                                  LenskitConfiguration defaults)
                                    throws RecommenderBuildException
        Build a recommender.
        Parameters:
        defaults - Additional configuration. This configuration comes before the algorithm's configuration, so it is overridden if appropriate. It is used for providing things such as DAOs.
        Returns:
        The instantiated recommender.
        Throws:
        RecommenderBuildException

      • buildRecommenderGraph

        public DAGNode<Component,Dependency> buildRecommenderGraph(@Nullable
                                                  LenskitConfiguration defaults)
                                                    throws RecommenderConfigurationException
        Build a recommender graph (but don't instantiate any objects).
        Parameters:
        defaults - Additional configuration. This configuration comes before the algorithm's configuration, so it is overridden if appropriate. It is used for providing things such as DAOs.
        Returns:
        The recommender graph.
        Throws:
        RecommenderConfigurationException - if there is an error configuring the recommender.
